text: Male/Female bodyguarding services for individuals and groups, protective driving and secure transport, threat assessment and route planning, discreet or high-profile presence.
Crowd control, access management, VIP and performer protection, guest screening.
Visible deterrence with licensed, trained professionals.

Random or scheduled patrols of commercial, residential, and industrial properties, deterrence of criminal activity through visible presence, quick response to alarms or disturbances, report writing and incident documentation.
Gatehouse attendants or doormen, temporary coverage during vacations or emergencies, temporary or long-term office/building guards, access control and visitor management.
Quick booking and post-paid emergency security services.
